description: A Mojito Wave configuration for generating a test object

id.title: Wave ID
id.description: The test ID and part of the experiment salt

name.title: Wave name
name.description: The name of the test used in reports

sampleRate.title: Sample rate
sampleRate.description: Percentage of units exposed to the test between 0-1

divertTo.title: Divert to recipe
divertTo.description: Divert all traffic in this test to a specified recipe ID

recipes.title: Recipes object
recipes.description: The different recipes or treatments to assign traffic amongst

name.title: Recipe name
name.description: The name of the recipe used in reports

js.title: Recipe JS
js.description: Relative path to the recipe's JS function

css.title: Recipe CSS
css.description: Relative path to the recipe's CSS stylesheet

sampleRate.title: Sample rate
sampleRate.description: The sample of traffic in the test to assign to this recipe (between 0-1)

trigger.title: Trigger function
trigger.description: Relative path to the experiment's trigger JS function - the function that activates an experiment

js.title: Shared JS
js.description: Relative path to a shared JS function run before all recipes

css.title: Shared CSS
css.description: Relative path to shared CSS styles applied for all recipes

gaExperimentId.title: Google Optimize Experiment ID
gaExperimentId.description: Track this experiment in Google Optimize under a given Experiment ID

state.title: State
state.description: Specifies whether the experiment is actively accepting users into the test (i.e. live) or not (i.e. staging or inactive)

manualExposure.title: Manual exposure
manualExposure.description: Controls whether exposure tracking will be handled manually (i.e. within the variant code, or automatically, upon assignment)
